title: The Rise of Edge Computing: Transforming Application Architecture

sections.title: Edge Revolution
sections.markdown:
# The Rise of Edge Computing

Discover how edge computing is revolutionizing application performance and user experience, and learn strategies for implementing edge-first architectures.

> "Edge is the new cloud."

[Edge Computing Resources](https://edgecomputingworld.com)

sections.title: Implementation Strategies
sections.markdown:
## Strategies

- Edge-first design
- Performance gains
- User experience

:::alert
**Info:** Latency is key at the edge!
:::

sections.title: Edge Table
sections.markdown:
### Edge vs Cloud

| Approach | Latency | Cost   |
|----------|---------|--------|
| Edge     | Low     | Medium |
| Cloud    | High    | Low    |
